message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive deal on this high-quality product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $9500. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway just yet. I'm willing to make a compromise, though. I can do $9000, but I'm not going any lower than that. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I understand your compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I can do $8250. Can you consider that?
